description: RepeatMePlease web application - A Flask-based web service that generates repeated sentences. Runs on localhost:4567 with Werkzeug development server (Python 3.13.3).
notes: The application uses Bootstrap 4.5.2 for styling and jQuery 3.5.1 for client-side interactions. Main functionality accessible through POST /generate endpoint. No API documentation endpoints found. No authentication or authorization mechanisms identified.
